name: PKSecureElementPass.PassActivationState
desc: The activation states of a Secure Element pass.

items.name: case requiresActivation
items.desc: The pass requires activation by the issuer.

items.name: case activating
items.desc: The pass isn’t ready to use, but activation is in progress

items.name: case activated
items.desc: The pass is active and ready to use.

items.name: case suspended
items.desc: The user or the issuer has suspended the pass and it isn’t available to use.

items.name: case deactivated
items.desc: The issuer has deactivated the pass.
